scripts.prebuild: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const modulePath = path.join('node_modules', '@rollup', 'rollup-linux-x64-gnu'); try { if (fs.existsSync(modulePath)) { fs.rmSync(modulePath, { recursive: true }); console.log('Removed problematic module'); } } catch (e) { console.log('Module not found or could not be removed, continuing...'); }"
